title.narrative: KAZ/Creating conditions for inclusive education for disabled children: piloting success

description.narrative: The Project will help to promote the first pilot efforts on inclusive education for disabled children in Kazakhstan. Inclusive education is proclaimed as one of state priorities in the policy towards people with disabilities. However there is still limited state support for creation of necessary conditions to make it successful. Discriminatory mentality stigma and physically inaccessible environments at schools make it almost impossible for disabled children to enrol in the standard primary education which in turn constrain their opportunities for higher education and employment. The Project will facilitate inclusive education at pilot school in Astana by creating necessary technical methodological and cultural conditions further promoting best practice to t he national level.
